import React from 'react'; import { motion } from 'framer-motion'; import { BarChart, Bar, XAxis, YAxis, CartesianGrid, Tooltip, ResponsiveContainer, LineChart, Line, AreaChart, Area } from 'recharts'; import './Impact.css'; const Impact = () => { const impactData = [ { year: '2020', families: 150, income: 45, yield: 120, women: 80 }, { year: '2021', families: 650, income: 85, yield: 180, women: 220 }, { year: '2022', families: 1200, income: 125, yield: 240, women: 450 }, { year: '2023', families: 1850, income: 165, yield: 285, women: 680 }, { year: '2024', families: 2500, income: 180, yield: 300, women: 850 } ]; const stories = [ { name: 'Maria Akech', location: 'Nyumanzi Settlement', story: 'Before PuurKu, my family survived on one meal a day. Through their training program, I learned modern farming techniques and received quality seeds. Now I harvest enough maize to feed my family and sell surplus at the market. My children go to school with full stomachs.', impact: '400% increase in crop yield', image: 'üë©‚Äçüåæ' }, { name: 'John Deng', location: 'Ayilo Settlement', story: 'As a young refugee, I felt hopeless about my future. PuurKu\'s youth program taught me agribusiness skills and leadership. Today, I manage a 10-hectare demonstration farm and train other young people. I\'ve become a community leader.', impact: 'Trained 150+ youth farmers', image: 'üë®‚Äçüåæ' }, { name: 'Grace Nyandeng', location: 'Nyumanzi Settlement', story: 'The women\'s cooperative changed everything. We learned to work together, share resources, and support each other. Our group now manages seed distribution for the entire settlement and runs a successful vegetable market.', impact: 'Led 50-member cooperative', image: 'üë•' } ]; return (
{/* Hero Section */}

Measuring What Matters

Real impact, real lives transformed. See how PuurKu Initiative is creating lasting change in refugee communities through data-driven agricultural empowerment.

2,500+ Families Empowered
300% Average Yield Increase
850+ Women Trained
{/* Impact Metrics */}

Our Growing Impact

Families Reached Over Time

Crop Yield Improvement

Income Growth (%)

Women Empowered

{/* Success Stories */}

Stories of Transformation

Behind every statistic is a human story of resilience, growth, and hope.

{stories.map((story, index) => (

{story.name}

{story.location}

"{story.story}"
{story.impact}
))}
{/* Impact Categories */}

Comprehensive Impact Areas

Food Security

95% Families now food secure
3.2x Average yield increase

Transforming food insecurity into abundance through sustainable farming practices and improved crop varieties.

Economic Empowerment

$450 Average monthly income
180% Income growth rate

Creating sustainable income streams through agricultural surplus, value addition, and market linkages.

Community Development

25 Farmer cooperatives
500+ Community leaders trained

Building strong, self-reliant communities through collaborative farming and leadership development programs.

Social Impact

85% Reduced aid dependency
1,200 Children better nourished

Improving health, education, and social cohesion through enhanced nutrition and community resilience.

{/* Future Goals */}

Our 2025 Goals

75%

5,000 Families

Reach 5,000 refugee families with comprehensive agricultural support by end of 2025.

60%

Agricultural Center

Complete construction of the Refugee Agricultural Empowerment Center for permanent training facilities.

45%

1,500 Women Leaders

Train 1,500 women in advanced agricultural techniques and cooperative management.

{/* Call to Action */}

Be Part of This Impact

Every contribution multiplies our impact. Join us in creating lasting change that transforms lives and builds sustainable futures for refugee communities.

Support Our Work See Our Programs
); }; export default Impact;
